- Complexity grows with voxels × clusters × iterations; prefer slice-wise or hashing methods as N grows.

# Memory {#memory}
- Rough estimate: `n_vox * n_time * 8 bytes` for raw doubles.

# Rules of thumb {#rules-of-thumb}
- Small (<10k vox): supervoxels or SNIC
- Medium (10k–100k): SLIC or slice-MSF
- Large (>100k): slice-MSF or FLASH-3D
